BodyName: Subcommittee on Landmarks, Public Siting and Maritime Uses

Items.Title: Application No 20175059 HKK (N 170058 HKK) pursuant to Section 3020 of the New York City Charter, concerning the designation by the Landmarks Preservation Commission of the Williamsburg Trust Company Building, located at 177-185 South 5th Street (Block 2446, Lot 63), as an historic landmark, Borough of Brooklyn, Community Board 1, Council District 34.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Landmarks, WILLIAMSBURG TRUST COMPANY, Brooklyn (20175059 HKK (N 170058 HKK))

Items.Title: Application No 20175059 HKK (N 170058 HKK) pursuant to Section 3020 of the New York City Charter, concerning the designation by the Landmarks Preservation Commission of the Williamsburg Trust Company Building, located at 177-185 South 5th Street (Block 2446, Lot 63), as an historic landmark, Borough of Brooklyn, Community Board 1, Council District 34.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Land Use Application be Approved by Subcommittee approved by Roll Call.
